instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2914: What is 820-2914? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan on high Speed & slow.
threads.message:
Hi,

This is not a liquid dmg board. How ever ASD test failed on (TG)D)- GPU Die, (TG)P)- GPU 0 Proximity, Fin Stack , Right Fin stack, Palm Proximity as bellow photo.
U 5550, 1, 7,8,9,10 has 3.3V. I replaced the SMC still same boot to the OS but very slow and fan on high speed. 

Any help greatly appreciate.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan on high Speed & slow.
threads.message:
I don't see Palm Proximity in the photo.
But if is the case, then try known good trackpad board and flex.
Such sensor is embedded in the trackpad circuitry.
Also check continuity between <CHIP>U5550</CHIP> and corresponding sensors, <TRANSISTOR>Q5501</TRANSISTOR>/03.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan on high Speed & slow.
threads.message: Going to have a dead GPU tomorrow as well so be ready

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan on high Speed & slow.
threads.message: Hi, Check with known woking body same result. traces between <CHIP>U5550</CHIP> to <TRANSISTOR>Q5501</TRANSISTOR>/03 are good. Replaced <TRANSISTOR>Q5501</TRANSISTOR>/03 and <CAPACITOR>C5552</CAPACITOR>. same result. any clue?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan on high Speed & slow.
threads.message: Try disconnecting airport card and camera.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan on high Speed & slow.
threads.message:
I did
I just connect only key b and track pad still same

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan on high Speed & slow.
threads.message: YOu recon FIn stack left and right proximity failed due to GPU Die and GPU 0 proximity failing or any other reason?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan on high Speed & slow.
threads.message: Any device connected on the same SMBus can generate the same problem.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan on high Speed & slow.
threads.message: SOLVED. As GPU Proximity/GPU Die/Left Heat Pipe/Right Fin Stack controlled by <CHIP>U5550</CHIP>, I replaced <CHIP>U5550</CHIP> . Bingo. ...Thank you very much for your support. Until I trouble you again take care.:)
